quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
author: Bear Bryant

quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
author: Aesop

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Tears of joy are like the summer rain drops pierced by sunbeams.
author: Hosea Ballou

quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp, Or what's a heaven for?
author: Robert Browning

quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind.
author: Johannes Brahms

quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
author: Edith Wharton

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
author: Ben Okri

quote: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.
author: Bill Copeland

quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, however measured or far away.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today!
author: William Allen White

quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Sharon Begley

quote: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: The only journey is the one within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
author: Alan Alda

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
author: Democritus

quote: Give light and people will find the way.
author: Ella Baker

quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.
author: Jack Dempsey

quote: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.
author: Arthur Helps

quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Light tomorrow with today!
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: If there were no night, we would not appreciate the day, nor could we see the stars and the vastness of the heavens. We must partake of the bitter with the sweet. There is a divine purpose in the adversities we encounter every day. They prepare, they purge, they purify, and thus they bless.
author: James E. Faust

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
author: Robert Frost

quote: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.
author: Aeschylus

quote: There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness.
author: Han Suyin

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.
author: Richard L. Evans

quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.
author: Augustus Hare

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Plutarch

quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.
author: Tommy Douglas

quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: God sleeps in the minerals, awakens in plants, walks in animals, and thinks in man.
author: Arthur Young

quote: Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.
author: John Wayne

quote: When deeds speak, words are nothing.
author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
author: Anne Frank

quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars.
author: Nicolaus Copernicus

quote: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.
author: John Ruskin

quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: Too low they build, who build beneath the stars.
author: Edward Young

quote: The handicap of deafness is not in the ear; it is in the mind.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Hope is some extraordinary spiritual grace that God gives us to control our fears, not to oust them.
author: Vincent McNabb

quote: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.
author: Lucy Larcom

quote: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: A place for everything, everything in its place.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.
author: Les Brown

quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It is only in sorrow bad weather masters us; in joy we face the storm and defy it.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: Whatever you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe, and enthusiastically act upon... must inevitably come to pass!
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life - and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.
author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: Think with your whole body.
author: Taisen Deshimaru

quote: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: It's a moment that I'm after, a fleeting moment, but not a frozen moment.
author: Andrew Wyeth

quote: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.
author: Zane Grey

quote: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can.
author: Christa McAuliffe

quote: Ideas shape the course of history.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: I believe that if one always looked at the skies, one would end up with wings.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
author: Wilma Rudolph

quote: If you could only love enough, you could be the most powerful person in the world.
author: Emmet Fox

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Buddha

quote: I believe there's an inner power that makes winners or losers. And the winners are the ones who really listen to the truth of their hearts.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: You change your life by changing your heart.
author: Max Lucado

quote: As knowledge increases, wonder deepens.
author: Charles Morgan

quote: Every day we should hear at least one little song, read one good poem, see one exquisite picture, and, if possible, speak a few sensible words.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Countless as the sands of the sea are human passions.
author: Nikolai Gogol

quote: I know why I am here and my only real focused goal is to live each day to the fullest and to try and honor God and be an encouragement to others. What the future holds is firmly in God's hands, and I am very happy about that!
author: Ken Hensley

quote: Nothing is worth more than this day.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.
author: Corita Kent

quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Find out who you are and be that person. That's what your soul was put on this Earth to be. Find that truth, live that truth and everything else will come.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
author: Og Mandino

quote: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Be not entangled in this world of days and nights; Thou hast another time and space as well.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: From its brilliancy everything is illuminated.
author: Guru Nanak

quote: My mind's my kingdom.
author: Francis Quarles

quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: The only thing that ultimately matters is to eat an ice-cream cone, play a slide trombone, plant a small tree, good God, now you're free.
author: Ray Manzarek

quote: I pray God may preserve your health and life many years.
author: Junipero Serra

quote: If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
author: Anne Frank

quote: I believe in living today. Not in yesterday, nor in tomorrow.
author: Loretta Young

quote: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder.
author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
author: John Muir

quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning.
author: Black Elk

quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.
author: William Blake

quote: And now, this is the sweetest and most glorious day that ever my eyes did see.
author: Donald Cargill

quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: I am so fresh in soul and spirit that life gushes and bubbles around me in a thousand springs.
author: Robert Schumann

quote: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.
author: Wallis Simpson

quote: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Keep all special thoughts and memories for lifetimes to come. Share these keepsakes with others to inspire hope and build from the past, which can bridge to the future.
author: Mattie Stepanek

quote: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Great hopes make great men.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
author: Jules Renard

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I said to the almond tree, 'Friend, speak to me of God,' and the almond tree blossomed.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: What we need is more people who specialize in the impossible.
author: Theodore Roethke

quote: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.
author: Alan Watts

quote: A man has to learn that he cannot command things, but that he can command himself; that he cannot coerce the wills of others, but that he can mold and master his own will: and things serve him who serves Truth; people seek guidance of him who is master of himself.
author: James Allen

quote: We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Enthusiasm moves the world.
author: Arthur Balfour

quote: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Vitality shows in not only the ability to persist but the ability to start over.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: One today is worth two tomorrows.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: A human being has so many skins inside, covering the depths of the heart. We know so many things, but we don't know ourselves! Why, thirty or forty skins or hides, as thick and hard as an ox's or bear's, cover the soul. Go into your own ground and learn to know yourself there.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Reach for the stars.
author: Christa McAuliffe

quote: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: There are glimpses of heaven to us in every act, or thought, or word, that raises us above ourselves.
author: Robert Quillen

quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it.
author: Emile Zola

quote: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The authentic self is the soul made visible.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Joy descends gently upon us like the evening dew, and does not patter down like a hailstorm.
author: Jean Paul

quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Hope is but the dream of those who wake.
author: Matthew Prior

quote: Show me your hands. Do they have scars from giving? Show me your feet. Are they wounded in service? Show me your heart. Have you left a place for divine love?
author: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: I believe it is in my nature to dance by virtue of the beat of my heart, the pulse of my blood and the music in my mind.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: God loves to help him who strives to help himself.
author: Aeschylus

quote: It seems to me we can never give up longing and wishing while we are thoroughly alive. There are certain things we feel to be beautiful and good, and we must hunger after them.
author: George Eliot

quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
author: Unknown

quote: Our time here is magic! It's the only space you have to realize whatever it is that is beautiful, whatever is true, whatever is great, whatever is potential, whatever is rare, whatever is unique, in. It's the only space.
author: Ben Okri

quote: I dwell in possibility.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Belief creates the actual fact.
author: William James

quote: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: Just what future the Designer of the universe has provided for the souls of men I do not know, I cannot prove. But I find that the whole order of Nature confirms my confidence that, if it is not like our noblest hopes and dreams, it will transcend them.
author: Henry Norris Russell

quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
author: Anatole France

quote: Whatever ought to be, can be.
author: James Rouse

quote: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.
author: John Wooden

quote: Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: We are here to make another world.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: There is a loftier ambition than merely to stand high in the world. It is to stoop down and lift mankind a little higher.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: We convince by our presence.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Each day provides its own gifts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: On the recollection of so many and great favours and blessings, I now, with a high sense of gratitude, presume to offer up my sincere thanks to the Almighty, the Creator and Preserver.
author: William Bartram

quote: Prayer is man's greatest power!
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Let each man exercise the art he knows.
author: Aristophanes

quote: Plant thy foot firmly in the prints which His foot has made before thee.
author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

quote: Every man's life is a fairy tale written by God's fingers.
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Act like you expect to get into the end zone.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Create each day anew.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Look within. Within is the fountain of good, and it will ever bubble up, if thou wilt ever dig.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Miracles are a retelling in small letters of the very same story which is written across the whole world in letters too large for some of us to see.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: People tell you the world looks a certain way. Parents tell you how to think. Schools tell you how to think. TV. Religion. And then at a certain point, if you're lucky, you realize you can make up your own mind. Nobody sets the rules but you. You can design your own life.
author: Carrie-Anne Moss

quote: If you look at a building by Mies van der Rohe, it might look very simple, but up close, the sheer quality of construction, materials and thought are inspirational.
author: David Chipperfield

quote: Inside, I've got a real purist desire and dream about the music. I like the idea of being able to carve out a kind of magical, colourful, artistic, inspirational life. And the reality just turns out to be quite different, working with the business to bring this thing you have created into the world.
author: Damien Rice

quote: When I first got involved in the underground metal scene in '82, '83, there were only about five or six major Death or Black Metal bands around. There were so many other bands that were inspirational, that really helped.
author: Chuck Schuldiner

quote: Honestly, the All In women's locker room was such an inspirational group of women. What I love about all the women involved - Chelsea, Britt, Madison, Jordynne Grace, Brandi Rhodes, Tenille Dashwood, Penelope Ford, Mandy Leon - is we all bring something so different to the table for a common vision.
author: Tessa Blanchard

quote: When I started my career, I never looked at myself as one to be inspirational, but as I continued to grow, I've met so many different people who ask, 'How do you do it? You make it look easy.' But it's not easy. I have certain tricks and tips I use every day that have been working for me.
author: Karen Civil

quote: Teachers need to be more inspirational. But it's also up to engineering to make itself more interesting.
author: Bruce Dickinson

quote: I am never without my lyric book. If anything inspirational happens, I have it there so nothing's forgotten.
author: Gabrielle Aplin

quote: I think Spain will always remain inspirational, and I think French cuisine will continue to be very French and yet very relevant with its time and keep evolving. But the last thing you want for it is to become too trendy and confusing. It has too much history.
author: Daniel Boulud

quote: At the end of the day, the one commonality that both Hindi cinema and Hollywood share is that they are full of talented and inspirational people. Outside of this, there are many differences, from the scheduling and rehearsal to promotion and directing techniques.
author: Nargis Fakhri

quote: I think, aesthetically, car design is so interesting - the dashboards, the steering wheels, and the beauty of the mechanics. I don't know how any of it works, I don't want to know, but it's inspirational.
author: Paloma Picasso

quote: Hopefully, when people see 'Senna', they will understand why this inspirational story needed to be told, why it had to be made as a movie for the big screen, and why it is a film for everyone.
author: Asif Kapadia

quote: I've done a lot of albums and I kinda know when I'm onto something that was inspirational for me to record and create, and this was one of those projects where I really enjoyed making the album.
author: Lee Ritenour

quote: The upper middle class here still has options for entertainment. We have Internet, Hollywood and books. But for the majority and the masses, there is only TV. A lot of them sit at home and watch TV as they can't afford other forms of entertainment. So, we try to do shows which have inspirational value.
author: Sanam Saeed

quote: I pull a lot of the stuff that I play off the rhythm tracks - and Keith Richards has been one of the main contributors to my inspirational playing.
author: Bobby Keys

quote: Before the music and before the fame, I loved Apl for Allan Pineda, for being a brother that he is and for the inspiration - for him to actually come to the States from the Philippines and make something of his life. That's inspirational.
author: Taboo

quote: A lot of straight and transgender boys get in touch with me through my website and social media. They tell me I'm inspirational and beautiful. It boosts my self-esteem.
author: Jazz Jennings

quote: I do kind of marvel at my journey. But at the same time, I look back at a lot of the steps, and maybe not every step, but a lot of the steps, and since I was 12 or 13, I look at the people who helped me and the moments that were inspirational to me, and you can recall what my mindset and what my make-up was at that time to try and be the best.
author: Chris Bosh

quote: The MTC is known for singing music by great master composers, hymns, American music, Broadway numbers, popular songs, and inspirational music. If the audience doesn't like one genre, they need only wait for the next number.
author: Mack Wilberg

quote: I feel that music is such an inspirational form of energy, as baseball is. And especially with Metallica, believe it or not, our shows are very physical. Sports is a very physical thing, too.
author: Robert Trujillo

quote: I did an A Level in Theatre Studies and had a really inspirational teacher, and then I just went on to university.
author: Jessica Raine

quote: Traveling around the country, meeting fans and hearing their stories in person and on my radio show has reenergized my commitment to creating honest and inspirational content that not only serves my own creative purposes but can help and touch others as well.
author: Nikki Sixx

quote: I always like a woman in power in politics. I think they're pretty inspirational in terms of looks to begin with. It's very calculated.
author: Chris Benz

quote: I look forward to making tangible and inspirational contributions to the Houston Technology Center's initiatives. HTC is an engine behind Houston's and Texas' continued growth.
author: Walter O'Brien

quote: You always draw inspiration from your family or your parents if they've proven to be inspirational. My mother is someone who's always been inspirational to me.
author: Dustin Clare

quote: For years, I've worn my dainty gold bracelets with inspirational sayings and encouraging one-liners to motivate me in my career. I liked to look down at my wrist and be reminded of my goals.
author: Rachel Hollis

quote: By now, you've probably caught on to something: my mother is always standing by with just the right Scripture or inspirational saying to get me through any tough situation.
author: Gabby Douglas

quote: Deacon Jones has been the most inspirational person in my football career.
author: Jack Youngblood

quote: Silent pictures show us how we lived and what our attitudes were. And as an art form, they can be wonderfully entertaining and often inspirational.
author: Kevin Brownlow

quote: Whenever I would go to Hrithik's vanity van to chat or rehearse lines, I'd see him working out or watching inspirational videos. One thing that I've learnt from him is that, as an actor, you have to worship your body.
author: Mrunal Thakur

quote: The government will see that human spaceflight is useful - for science and the economy - and inspirational.
author: Helen Sharman

quote: I wrote '('Til) I Kissed You' about a girl I met in Australia. Her name was Lilian, and she was very, very inspirational. I was married, but... I wrote the song about her on the way back home.
author: Don Everly

quote: I grew up in a bookless house - my parents didn't read poetry, so if I hadn't had the chance to experience it at school I'd never have experienced it. But I loved English, and I was very lucky in that I had inspirational English teachers, Miss Scriven and Mr. Walker, and they liked us to learn poems by heart, which I found I loved doing.
author: Carol Ann Duffy

quote: Had I not come out with an inspirational CD, you perhaps would have never known that I feel like I feel, that all songs, all the music I've ever done is a gift from God.
author: Smokey Robinson

quote: You see countries like India really investing in their space program because they see it as inspirational and good for their economy.
author: Ellen Stofan

quote: There are thousands of inspirational stories waiting to be told about young women who yearn for a great education. They are stories of struggle and stories of success, and they will inspire others to take action and work to change lives.
author: Soledad O'Brien

quote: I knew, regardless of anything else, singing in front of an orchestra was going to be inspirational. It would feed me.
author: George Michael

quote: I really think that it's disgusting that Paris is the only place where it is illegal for paps to follow you around. It actually took someone losing their life - Diana, an inspirational woman - and then it changed, but they still won't change it in London! It's horrible!
author: Cara Delevingne

quote: I feel like music itself is inspirational enough. Especially with the Internet. Not to sound like a shut-in.
author: Thundercat

quote: There have been many different artists that have been inspirational. I suppose the question is directed to what was the reason why I went into fantasy illustration.
author: Boris Vallejo

quote: In Spain, they show many Premier League games on TV, and it is an inspirational league. Maybe I would like to play in the Premier League.
author: Juan Mata

quote: I think being directed and mentored by someone as inspirational as Paul Feig not only improves my performance but, as a whole, makes it what it is.
author: Nargis Fakhri

quote: I wanted to write a book about what it's like to be 50 and trying to reinvent yourself - that struggle. There are all these books and inspirational speakers talking about being a lifelong learner, and it's so great to reinvent yourself, the brand of you. And I wanted to say, you know, it's not like that. It's actually really painful.
author: Daniel Lyons

quote: Who would have thought that a tap-dancing penguin would outpoint James Bond at the box office? And deserve to? Not that there's anything wrong with 'Casino Royale.' But 'Happy Feet' - written and directed by George Miller - is a complete charmer, even if, in the way of most family fare, it can't resist straying into the Inspirational.
author: Robert Gottlieb

quote: I wanted to do something inspirational for my children.
author: Harvey Weinstein
